node.title: Khawaja calls on Cummins, Finch to end speculation on Langer revolt
node.alt: Australia men's cricket coach Justin Langer and player Usman Khawaja walk around Manuka Oval in their warm-up gear.
node.description: Usman Khawaja says only Test and ODI captains Pat Cummins and Aaron Finch can end the rumours of a player revolt that led to Justin Langer's resignation.
node.content:
["Test batsman Usman Khawaja says\u00a0only Test and ODI captains Pat Cummins and Aaron Finch clearing the air \u2014 over their\u00a0role in Justin Langer's exit as Australia's coach \u2014 will end speculation over a player revolt.", "Khawaja said he was saddened for Justin Langer \"the person\" following his decision last Saturday to walk away from the role, despite having led Australia to the T20 World Cup and a comprehensive Ashes success in the past three months.", "Langer ended his four-year tenure as national coach after rejecting an offer from Cricket Australia of a six-month extension with no scope for a future deal.", "Khawaja said he was unaware of the exact details behind the situation, having only just returned to the team ahead of the third Test in Sydney.", "Several notable former stars \u2014 such as Mitchell Johnson and Matt Hayden \u2014 have criticised Cummins' for a lack of public support for Langer.", "", "
Pat Cummins is yet to speak publicly since Justin Langer's exit.(ABC News:\u00a0Luke Bowden)
", "But Khawaja did not want to speculate on just how much say Cummins and limited-overs captain Aaron Finch had in the coach's demise.", "\"I just came back in the team two months ago. I've been a little bit out of it, a little bit disconnected, but there's obviously a lot of ex-players coming and talking about the playing group,\" Khawaja said.", "\"At some stage, one of the captains, probably Finchy or Patty, will probably have to stand up and answer some questions just to get rid of all the speculation that's going around.", "\"To just put an end to it all.\"", "", "
Justin Langer resigned as head coach on Saturday.(Getty Images:\u00a0Chris Hyde)
", "Khawaja confirmed he had reached out to Langer following his resignation, and lauded how the West Australian had restored a level of humility to the national team.", "He also insisted his own relationship with the 51-year-old was good, despite speculation of a rift following his national team axing during the 2019 Ashes \u2014 with a subsequent documentary of the tour, showing the Queensland batter giving the coach forthright feedback.", "\"JL is one guy if you give him feedback, he normally pushes back to start [with] but always takes it in at some stage,\" Khawaja said.", "\"He was always trying to improve as a coach, as a person, and trying to do his best.", "\"I could see, definitely, improvements in places where he probably was a bit weaker with his coaching and it's like all of us, we're all trying to improve trying to get better and I could definitely see that the effort being put in.", "\"I still always got along with him.\"", "Langer's former Test teammate,\u00a0Jason Gillespie, has also reached out in recent days and said the messy exit was \"heartbreaking\"."]
